title: [Health] Young adults age 18 to 34 years hospitalized with Covid-19 (n=3,222) experienced substantial rates of adverse outcomes: 21% required intensive care, 10% required mechanical ventilation, and 2.7% died. Researchers say Covid-19 is a “life-threatening disease for people of all ages.”

[Medicine] Kids with COVID-19, flu equally prone to severe illness: A single-center study of 315 pediatric COVID-19 patients and 1,402 children with seasonal flu identified no difference in rates of hospitalization, intensive care unit (ICU) admission, or mechanical ventilation between the two groups
